content: round 27 1 single_crochet 1 decrease x 5 10 round 28 decrease x 5 5 slip_stitch in next st fasten_off and leave a yarn tail weave the yarn tail through the front eyes above loops of each stitch and pull it tight to close then weave in the yarn ends increases and aligned with the nostrils use thin black yarn for eye- embroider the white area of eyes lashes and eyebrows or cut a by pulling the white yarn from one piece from your current yarn side to the other side and push and divide the threads and the thread to stay under the eye pick out 2 of them see below embroider the eyelashes like this 4 heart make 2 make a magic_ring chain 2 make following into the magic_ring 3 double_crochet 4 single_crochet double_crochet 4 single_crochet 3 double_crochet pull the loose yarn tail and close the magic_ring chain 2 and slip_stitch into the hole in the middle of the magic_ring fasten_off and leave a long tail to sew to the legs you will do all the stitches inside then pull hard and tightly to close the magic_ring up the heart 5 leg make 2 make 6 chain round 1 start on the second chain from the hook 4 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in last chain turn and work on the opposite side of the chain 3 single_crochet increase 12 round 2 increase 3 single_crochet increase x 3 3 single_crochet increase x 2 18 round 3 increase 4 single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet x3 3 change back to main color 2 single_crochet change to white 1 bobble change back to main color 9 single_crochet 24 see how to do color change with bobble stitch below round 6 24 single_crochet 24 1 before you close the last 2 close the single_crochet 3 make now a bobble stitch 4 pick up the pink yarn and single_crochet single_crochet before by following step 1-7 from yarn over heading to bobble stitch you page 3 you will now have five will change color to white loops on the hook 5 draw the yarn through all 6 continue with the next stitch 7 push out the booble stitch 8 now you will have bobble loops that is a single_crochet from backside to make it look stitches in different color cut the better repeat step 1-6 for the white yarn and tie the both white next bobble stitches too yarn tails together to secure it continue with pink yarn 6 tip to make the sewing easier sew the heart now to the sole of the foot round 7 8 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet decrease 8
